data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of deep-sea shrimps of the Superfamily Oplophoroidea Dana 1852 (Decapoda: Caridea) from Southwestern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alves-Júnior, Flavio De Almeida, Silva, Elinai Dos Santos, Araújo, Marina De Sá Leitão Câmara De, Cardoso, Irene, Bertrand, Arnaud, Souza-Filho, Jesser F. (2019): Taxonomy of deep-sea shrimps of the Superfamily Oplophoroidea Dana 1852 (Decapoda: Caridea) from Southwestern Atlantic. Zootaxa 4613 (3): 401-442, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4613.3.1
